TopicTitle: Mod that allow editor camera movement outside VAB/SPH?

Articles.Content:
I wanted a mod that allow editor camera movement outside VAB/SPH.

Why? Because:

  1. Offsetting the vessel very very far away to gain starting height or clip to the ocean bottom.
  2. Huge rockets.
  3. Seeing what's outside the VAB/SPH.
  4. SPACE ELEVATOR!!!
  5. Freeroam on editor.

If anyone found one, please, tell me.

Edited April 16, 2016 by Anbang11

I know there is one, I’ve seen it in action, and am trying to find it myself, but don’t know what the name is. 

I’ll let you know if I find it. Happy Hunting!

Here we go! It’s called ‘Hangar Extender’ and the link is: 

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/59703-10-hangar-extender-v33/#comment-893599

This isn’t something I’d normally need, but I just got B9 Aerospace, so yeah.

By the way, if you like building ridiculously large rockets, B9 is the way to go.

Edited August 3, 2016 by Mycroft
